body_html:
Ok, the history of commits referenced in this issue suggests that something was reverted. This is a bit confusing.

Anyway, I think the broadcasting is still very much too limited. This feature request should also maybe be renamed to allow any broadcasting. I guess people would expect the straightforward behavior (which is the same in numpy.where I guess).

body:
Ok, the history of commits referenced in this issue suggests that something was reverted. This is a bit confusing.

Anyway, I think the broadcasting is still very much too limited. This feature request should also maybe be renamed to allow any broadcasting. I guess people would expect the straightforward behavior (which is the same in `numpy.where` I guess).
